title: Peppers with fennel
description: The aniseed flavour of fennel makes a delicious partner for roasted peppers.
methods: Preheat the oven to Mark 7/ 220°C/425°F. Halve the peppers, keeping the stems attached, then carefully remove the seeds.
Season, rub with garlic and put in an oiled roasting tin. Put a slice of fennel in each pepper. Scatter over pine nuts and drizzle with oil. Roast for 30-40 mins until tender.
